content:
# I successfully crafted a Stone Furnace and my inventory now reflects that, along with the remaining resources.
# Now, I need to place the Stone Furnace and insert the iron ore and coal into it for smelting.

# First, I will place the Stone Furnace at a suitable position. 
# I will use my current position as the reference point for placing the furnace.

position_for_furnace = Position(x=0, y=0)  # Assuming I want to place it at the origin for simplicity.
furnace = place_entity(Prototype.StoneFurnace, position=position_for_furnace)  # Placing the Stone Furnace.
print(f"Furnace placed at {furnace.position}.")  # Confirming the placement.
